attributes.action: government should enforce licences to have listening devices, e.g.fishing licences. stopping paedaphiles or perverts buying one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: government should change their laws on buying a listening device from spy shops or internet.they should be licensed,to stop paedaphiles and perverts using them against their neighbours or commuinity.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
